Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.   1. City Council

City Council

Regular meetings of the Marysville City Council take place at 7 p.m. the second and fourth Monday of each month (excluding holidays). Council Work Sessions take place at 7 p.m. the first Monday of each month. The Council does not meet the month of August or the fourth Monday of December.

501 Delta Ave., Council Chambers 2nd Floor, Marysville, WA 98270

To listen to the meeting without providing public comment, visit: https://us06web.zoom.us/j/86246307568

Or dial in at 888-475-4499 with meeting ID 862 4630 7568

The City Council is conducting hybrid Council meetings and Work Sessions. This means residents can attend meetings in-person or remotely via Zoom.

If you would like to provide at an upcoming City Council meeting, sign up is required. Please fill out this form by 12 p.m. the day of the Council meeting . Directions will be emailed to you by 5 p.m. the day of the meeting.

If you would like to submit , you may do so in the written comment section of the form . Written comment must be submitted by 3:00 p.m. the day of the Council meeting.

Both written and verbal public comment will be documented as public comment. If you have any questions, please contact the City Clerk's Office at 360-363-8000 or cityclerk@marysvillewa.gov .

L-R: Councilmembers Steve Muller, Tom King, Kelly Richards; Mayor Jon Nehring; Councilmembers Kamille Norton, Mark James; Council President Michael Stevens; Councilmember Peter Condyles.
